title: OPA Authorization Middleware Config
description: Configuration for the OPA authorization middleware plugin. Evaluates access control policies via the OPA REST API.

opa_url.description: OPA Data API endpoint URL (e.g., http://opa:8181/v1/data/authz/allow)

timeout.description: HTTP request timeout in seconds for OPA calls

include_body.description: Include the request body in the OPA input payload. Disabled by default to avoid sending large payloads.

include_claims.description: Include parsed x-auth-claims header (set by upstream auth plugins) in the OPA input payload.

deny_message.description: Custom message returned in the 403 Forbidden response body when OPA denies access.
